tasks.title: Expand test coverage for enterprise secrets and log streaming modules
tasks.description:
Create comprehensive test coverage for the newly implemented enterprise secrets management and log streaming modules:

1. Enterprise secrets module comprehensive testing
2. Log streaming functionality testing
3. HSM integration testing
4. Vault configuration testing
5. Audit system testing
6. Security compliance validation testing

Target: Achieve 80%+ coverage for these critical security modules

tasks.title: Expand test coverage for core FastMCP server components
tasks.description:
Building on the resolved Jest infrastructure issues, expand test coverage for critical server components:

1. Implement comprehensive unit tests for middleware components
2. Create integration tests for API client functionality
3. Add end-to-end tests for tool registration and execution
4. Expand test coverage for error handling and edge cases
5. Create performance tests for high-load scenarios

Target: Achieve 60%+ test coverage (currently ~20%) by focusing on core components with highest business value.
success_criteria: All middleware components have unit tests
API client has comprehensive integration tests
Tool execution has e2e test coverage

tasks.title: Create comprehensive test suite for Make.com FastMCP server
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive test coverage for the FastMCP server. Current coverage is only 1.36% with zero coverage for all tool files. Need to create unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for all major components including tools, middleware, API client, and server functionality.

tasks.title: Fix critical test failures - destructuring errors and mock issues
tasks.description:
Address systematic test failures preventing test execution:

1. Fix destructuring errors in create-scenario.ts (Cannot destructure property log of undefined)
2. Fix budget-control-basic.test.ts undefined analysis property expectations
3. Fix mock promise rejection expectations in budget control tests
4. Fix schema validation issues with test parameters
5. Fix blueprint analysis connection extraction failures
6. Fix template complexity property access errors
7. Fix secure-config logger initialization failures

These infrastructure issues are blocking test coverage analysis and CI/CD pipeline.

tasks.title: Fix systematic test failures in budget-control and integration tests
tasks.description:
Address critical test failures preventing test suite execution:

1. Fix undefined property expectations in budget-control tests (analysis property undefined)
2. Fix mock promise rejection expectations - promises resolving instead of rejecting
3. Fix UserError vs Error type mismatches in test expectations
4. Fix circuit breaker state issues (expected closed, received open)
5. Fix workflow execution failures (expected completed, received failed)
6. Fix class constructor invocation errors in diagnostic rules

Total: Multiple test suite failures blocking coverage analysis and CI/CD pipeline.

tasks.title: Fix critical test execution failures in budget control and diagnostic rules
tasks.description:
Address systematic test failures preventing proper test execution:

1. Fix undefined property expectations in budget-control-basic.test.ts (alertThresholds percentage, analysis properties)
2. Fix mock promise rejection expectations - tests expect rejections but promises resolve
3. Fix Class constructor invocation errors in diagnostic-rules.test.ts
4. Fix circuit breaker state expectations (expected closed, received open)
5. Fix workflow execution status expectations (expected completed, received failed)

These infrastructure issues are preventing proper test coverage analysis and need immediate resolution.

tasks.title: Fix critical test failures across multiple modules
tasks.description: Address systematic test failures in budget-control, scenarios, templates, connections, and secure-config modules. Key issues: undefined property access, mock configuration, schema validation failures, and middleware integration problems.

tasks.title: Fix remaining budget-control test failures - mock promises and schema validation
tasks.description:
Address remaining test failures identified in budget-control-basic.test.ts:

1. Fix mock promise rejection expectations - tests expect rejections but promises resolve (unauthorized access errors, security measures)
2. Fix schema validation issues with test parameters (confidenceLevel validation, unrecognized keys)
3. Fix missing property expectations in enterprise budget isolation tests
4. Fix parameter validation errors in automated cost control actions
5. Resolve UserError vs Error type mismatches in test expectations

These issues are preventing full test suite success and need resolution for proper CI/CD pipeline functionality.
